languages.text: {n}Тревога, испытываемая многими перед Блаженными, не улеглась. Со временем появились доклады об издевательствах и даже насилии против творений Горнила — столь силен был страх черни.{/n}

{n}The people's wariness of the Touched never went away. A number of reports have described cases of persecution and even violence toward the Crucible's creations — such was the rabble's fear of them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тревога, испытываемая многими перед Блаженными, не улеглась. Со временем появились доклады об издевательствах и даже насилии против творений Горнила — столь силен был страх черни.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The people's wariness of the Touched never went away. A number of reports described cases of persecution and even violence toward the Crucible's creations, for such was the rabble's fear of them.{/n}

{n}The people's wariness of the Touched never went away. A number of reports described cases of persecution and even violence toward the Crucible's creations, for such was the rabble's fear of them.{/n}

{n}The people's wariness of the Touched never went away. A number of reports have described cases of persecution and even violence toward the Crucible's creations — such was the rabble's fear of them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}人们对于受召者的警惕从未消失。部分报道甚至提及了针对受召者的迫害乃至暴力事件，这充分体现了众多平民对他们的恐惧有多深。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people's wariness of the Touched never went away. A number of reports have described cases of persecution and even violence toward the Crucible's creations — such was the rabble's fear of them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}人们对于受召者的警惕从未消失。部分报道甚至提及了针对受召者的迫害乃至暴力事件，这充分体现了众多平民对他们的恐惧有多深。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La desconfianza del pueblo hacia los Tocados nunca desapareció. Numerosos informes describen casos de persecución e incluso violencia contra las creaciones del Crisol, tal era el miedo que les tenía la plebe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people's wariness of the Touched never went away. A number of reports have described cases of persecution and even violence toward the Crucible's creations — such was the rabble's fear of them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La desconfianza del pueblo hacia los Tocados nunca desapareció. Numerosos informes describen casos de persecución e incluso violencia contra las creaciones del Crisol, tal era el miedo que les tenía la plebe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}民が抱く、触れられし者への警戒心は決して消えなかった。坩堝の創作物に対する迫害や暴力の事例は数多く報告されている...それは民の暴徒への恐怖によるものであった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people's wariness of the Touched never went away. A number of reports have described cases of persecution and even violence toward the Crucible's creations — such was the rabble's fear of them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}民が抱く、触れられし者への警戒心は決して消えなかった。坩堝の創作物に対する迫害や暴力の事例は数多く報告されている...それは民の暴徒への恐怖によるものであった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La crainte que suscitaient les Altérés ne se dissipe jamais réellement. De nombreux rapports font état de persécutions et même de violences perpétrées par la population effrayée par les créations du Creuset.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people's wariness of the Touched never went away. A number of reports have described cases of persecution and even violence toward the Crucible's creations — such was the rabble's fear of them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La crainte que suscitaient les Altérés ne se dissipe jamais réellement. De nombreux rapports font état de persécutions et même de violences perpétrées par la population effrayée par les créations du Creuset.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Misstrauen der Leute den Berührten gegenüber schwand nie ganz. Immer wieder wurden die Schöpfungen des Tiegels drangsaliert, teilweise wurde sogar Gewalt gegen sie verübt, so groß war die Angst des Pöbels vor ihnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people's wariness of the Touched never went away. A number of reports have described cases of persecution and even violence toward the Crucible's creations — such was the rabble's fear of them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Halk, Mütehassislere karşı tedbiri asla elden bırakmadı. Birtakım raporlarda Pota'nın yarattıklarına yönelik zulüm ve hatta şiddet vakalarının anlatıldığı oldu. Bunlar, ayaktakımının onlardan korkusunun bir sonucuydu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The people's wariness of the Touched never went away. A number of reports have described cases of persecution and even violence toward the Crucible's creations — such was the rabble's fear of them.{/n}
